welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Monterotondo, known for its charming streets, rich history, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in all the city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ciampino Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ciampino Airport, primarily used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, primarily used by low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, serving mostly international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 4 hours.
